name: Space Canyon
overview: Your Tactical Advanced Weapons Tank (TAWT) is out on a routine patrol through Sighah Canyon when it is suddendly ambushed by the Polydites, a hjostile warring faction. Both ends of the canyon have enemy tanks closing in and enemy ships are attacking from above. High Command, hearing of the situation, has written you off as another casualty. You have no choice but to fight. You know your strenghts and with a little luck you feel you might prevail.
